description:
With the addition of Yazaka Nico, μ’s begins operating as a proper club. Student council vice president Nozomi films the girls for a video introducing the school`s clubs. After finishing filming, Nozomi asks Honoka a question. Umi writes the lyrics and Kotori comes up with choreography, so why is Honoka the leader when she has no actual responsibilities? Upon hearing Nozomi`s observation, the members of μ’s sing and dance to determine their new leader. Who will be their new leader!?
Source: crunchyroll
